page.title: 06The M5 Motorway
page.content: The constuction of the Wellington section of the M5 motorway between Chelston and Willand began in 1974 and was completed in October 1976. A survey was taken on the morning of Friday 5th July.Fifeteen minute samples of the North and South bound carrigeways were taken. Most of the holiday traffic was travelling North. There were 3 mobile homes, 22 caravans, 22 cars with evidence of luggage and 2 camping trailers travelling North.Ther ewre no mobile homes,11 caravans, 19 cars with luggage and 2 trailers travelling south.Normally traffic at this time of the year is coming southwards.The reason for these different results is that people were travelling home in the early part of the morning and those coming on holiday had not yet reached this part of the country.
